programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters must survive the night in a desert motel against a horde of savage cartel killers when they realize their fugitive is much more than she lets on.(n)

programme.title: Contract To Kill
programme.desc: Harmon, a CIA/DEA enforcer, and his team uncover an Islamic extremists plan to use Sonora drug-smuggling routes to bring deadly weapons and leaders into the US.(n)

programme.title: Surrounded
programme.desc: A group of friends decide to take an illegal snorkeling trip to a beautiful cove. However, when their plane crashes, they're met with a pack of great white sharks.(n)

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Four young divers discover a shipwreck rumored to contain millions in gold, but everything goes awry when dangerous smugglers close in on them.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood ()
programme.desc: In 12th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.(n)

programme.title: Outlawed
programme.desc: An action packed story of corruption and murder. Outnumbered, outgunned and against all odds, a Commando fights his way through a siege to save his girl.(n)

programme.title: Hard Night Falling
programme.desc: After an Interpol operation in Italy, Michael attends a company dinner party when suddenly, the 50 guests are held hostage by 15-20 armed men for $150,000,000 there.(n)

programme.title: Witches In The Woods
programme.desc: Jill abandons her studies for an off-the-grid snowboarding trip with her friends. After becoming lost in the mountains, the group dynamic unravels as a literal witch hunt begins.(n)

programme.title: The Tracker
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger travels to a remote village where, 15 years earlier, his wife and daughter were kidnapped.(n)

programme.title: Beyond Justice
programme.desc: A young criminal defense attorney struggles with a homicide case that is not as cut-and-dried as it appears once the mob gets involved, and he quickly realizes that to keep himself and his client alive, he must work outside of the law.(n)

programme.title: The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.(n)

programme.title: Shockwave: Countdown To Disaster
programme.desc: When a pair of military robots crash on a deserted pacific island, a team of navy seals goes to destroy them, with disastrous consequence.(n)

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: The divorce of a couple leaves the mother with custody of their three children. The father dresses up as a proper British nanny so that he can be hired by his ex-wife to watch his own kids.(n)

programme.title: The Full Monty
programme.desc: A group of unemployed working class stiffs in the depressed midlands region of England decide to earn money as Chippendales style dancers, resulting in numerous comic complications to their lives.(n)

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: A riotous and raunchy exploration of the most eagerly anticipated and most humiliating rite of adulthood, known as losing one's virginity.(n)

programme.title: Stir Of Echoes
programme.desc: After being hypnotized by his sister in law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a dark mystery begins to unfold around him.(n)

programme.title: Dead Man Walking
programme.desc: A true story based on the experience of Sister Helen Prejean, a Catholic nun caught in a moral crisis; her role as a spiritual advisor to a convicted murderer on death row leads her to become an outspoken advocate against the death penalty, but her confrontation with the grieving families of his victims throws her into a deeper crisis of faith than she could ever have imagined.(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: Brian Flanagan, a bartender who becomes the toast of Manhattan's Upper East Side. But when he moves to Jamaica and meets Jordan, their romance brings a new perspective to the self-centered bartender's life.(n)

programme.title: Hello, Dolly!
programme.desc: A matchmaker named Dolly Levi takes a trip to Yonkers, New York to see the "Well-Known unmarried Half-A-Millionaire," Horace Vandergelder. While there, she convinces him, his two stock clerks and his niece and her beau to go to New York City. In New York, she fixes Vandergelder's clerks up with the woman Vandergelder had been courting, and her shop assistant (Dolly has designs of her own on Mr. Vandergelder, you see).(n)

Moreover, Sedong, a woman with a bright personality and Chang, his first love's son appear making him confused...(n)

programme.title: Mr. House Husband
programme.desc: This reality show observes six men who do both housekeeping and parenting.(n)

programme.title: Studio K
programme.desc: Studio K is KBS' digital entertainment and music channel. Catch the most entertaining content right here!(n)

programme.title: The Outsiders
programme.desc: Pei Yu Yan is a good student at school, and keeps a low profile as if she is a canary in a cage. Ever since she meets Yu Hao, her life changes; he is the boy who impresses her.(n)

programme.title: The Moment
programme.desc: This film talks about four relationships: A couple breaking up yet holding tight; a father and a daughter meeting up after a long separation; a girl escaping from growing up; and two buddies' reunion after years of misunderstanding.(n)

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: Three delinquents run into an old house in the middle of the night. The house was once a general goods store where people could leave letters in the mailbox to seek advice.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrow Is Another Day
programme.desc: Wong Kam Fa is a middle-aged housewife whose life revolves around her 20-year-old autistic son. After learning that her husband is having an affair, she plots to take revenge on the mistress.(n)

programme.title: Agent Mr. Chan
programme.desc: A disgraced agent is forced to come back for one last undercover assignment.(n)

programme.title: 23:59 The Haunting Hour
programme.desc: Recruit Tommy is bullied by his army mates. He seeks comfort from the compliments left by his readers on his blog that features fictitious army horror stories he writes. One day, things starts to go awry.(n)

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk
programme.desc: Alan is a rich kid looking forward to a busy 24 hours: his birthday celebration tonight and attending court as witness in a criminal trial the next morning. Alan's lawyer knows his client's unreliability, so he pressures Alan's dependable chum Chris to tag along.(n)

programme.title: The White Storm 2 Drug Lords
programme.desc: A wealthy businessman tries to take down a drug kingpin that he used to work with, while a policeman tries to find justice without breaking the law.(n)

programme.title: You Shoot, I Shoot
programme.desc: Hong Kong is an over-crowded city where people are easily provoked with confilcts and hatred. In such a crammed and hostile place, professional hitmen are in demand.(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Chinese archeology professor Jack teams up with beautiful Indian professor Ashmita and assistant Kyra to locate lost Magadha treasure. In a Tibetan ice cave, they find the remains of the royal army that had vanished together with the treasure, only to be ambushed by Randall.(n)

programme.title: Heartfall Arises
programme.desc: An officer from the special forces faces the most notorious criminal who is a legend in Hong Kong for killing Southeast Asia's top businessmen.(n)

programme.title: Forbidden City Cop
programme.desc: In Ancient China, Ling Ling Fatt is an Imperial agent whose lack of actual kung fu skills makes him initially unpopular with the Emperor. But Fatt's way with inventions gives him an edge on the invaders from the Gum province.(n)

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: A pretty young girl from an ordinary family, Qi Yao is lucky enough to win the second runner-up of the Miss Shanghai contest. Mr. Cheng knows the girl is going to live an extraordinary life.(n)

programme.title: Murmur Of The Hearts
programme.desc: Nan and Mei are brother and sister growing up on the beautiful Green Island, off the shore of the port city of Taitung in Taiwan. But soon their parents separate. Four-year-old Mei goes to Taipei with her mother, while seven-year-old Nan stays on Green Island with his father.(n)

programme.title: Saving Mr. Wu
programme.desc: An action-packed crime thriller based on the true story of China's famous celebrity kidnapping case. Mr. Wu is kidnapped in Beijing by Zhang Hua and three accomplices, all disguised as cops. In the ensuing 20 hours, Chinese detectives led by Chief Xing quickly form a task force to sweep the city.(n)

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk
programme.desc: Alan is a rich kid looking forward to a busy 24 hours: his birthday celebration tonight and attending court as witness in a criminal trial the next morning. Alan's lawyer knows his client's unreliability, so he pressures Alan's dependable chum Chris to tag along.(n)

programme.title: You Shoot, I Shoot
programme.desc: Hong Kong is an over-crowded city where people are easily provoked with confilcts and hatred. In such a crammed and hostile place, professional hitmen are in demand.(n)

programme.title: Tag Along 2
programme.desc: Social worker Li Shu-fen is often overwhelmed by her heavy workload and neglects her daughter Li Ya-ting as a result. When she discovers that Ya-ting has gone missing, she realises there is a past demon hidden at the bottom of her heart.(n)

programme.title: Explosion
programme.desc: A blast technician in a mining town survives an explosion, only to discover it may not have been an accident. While investigating the truth, he becomes the prime suspect.(n)

programme.title: Shadow
programme.desc: In Pei, a kingdom ruled by an unpredictable king, the military commander faces peril both inside and outside the palace walls. But he has a secret weapon: a "shadow", a look-alike who can fool both Pei's enemies and the King himself.(n)

programme.title: Mr Pride And Miss Prejudice
programme.desc: Online writer Tang Nan Nan crosses path with Zhu Hou, a second-generation rich boy, resulting in hilarious situations and face-offs.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - Final Round
programme.desc: One night while driving a taxi, former boxer Ma inadvertently rescues Yu Qing, a pregnant nightclub hostess, from a dangerous gangster. They run away and move constantly in order to stay hidden from the underworld. But their past eventually catches up to them.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - Begin Again
programme.desc: Ben, a hacker, works at the B&S Memory Bank where an individual's memories can be stored, reviewed as well as erased. He becomes fascinated by Ai: even though she has been physically abused by her lover, she continues to love him deeply and revisit her memories with him constantly.(n)

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: While two criminals hide out at a woman's apartment after a botched robbery, an ex-cop tries to find a missing gun.(n)

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: William Luk goes undercover as a prisoner to investigate correctional officers who are receiving bribes.(n)

programme.title: High Flash
programme.desc: Fisherman A-Hai is found dead by self-immolation during a protest led by newly-elected county Mayor Chen against Tonglian Petrochemical. The suspicious incident makes the headlines instantly.(n)

programme.title: Twenty
programme.desc: Freshly graduated from high school, best friends Chi Cho, Dong Woo and Kyung Jae have reached a crucial crossroads in their young lives. It's time to think about the future.(n)

programme.title: Hill Of Ilha Verde
programme.desc: Since the handover to China, Macau has become the number one gambling city in the world. In this city, 14-year-old Hio leaves home on a journey alone to search for her mum. Wandering between dreams and reality, she visits her family members scattered in different parts of the city.(n)

programme.title: Burning
programme.desc: Based on the Japanese novel Barn Burning by Haruki Murakami, Burning centres on the mystery surrounding chaebol Ben, delivery man Jong-su and young lady Hae-mi.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - Begin Again
programme.desc: Ben, a hacker, works at the B&S Memory Bank where an individual's memories can be stored, reviewed as well as erased. He becomes fascinated by Ai: even though she has been physically abused by her lover, she continues to love him deeply and revisit her memories with him constantly.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor playboy finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago.(n)

programme.title: Shining Moment
programme.desc: After being sidelined by the gymnastics team, Yu quits and reinvents himself as a Latin dance instructor. He assembles a group of children for a Latin dance competition. Can Yu teach them to dance?(n)

programme.title: Sakura Guardian In The North
programme.desc: Tetsu Ezure escapes with her son from Sakhalin Island after the Soviet Union invades the area as she struggles to survive as a refugee in Abashiri City's extreme cold weather and famine.(n)

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: San and Yo work as bodyguards-for-hire in Hong Kong, but business isn't exactly booming for these bumbling buddies. The two head to South Korea for a mysterious job to protect a reporter, but a hotel bombing leaves the client dead and sends them on the run as suspects.(n)

programme.title: 23:59 The Haunting Hour
programme.desc: Recruit Tommy is bullied by his army mates. He seeks comfort from the compliments left by his readers on his blog that features fictitious army horror stories he writes. One day, things starts to go awry.(n)

programme.title: Turn Around
programme.desc: A university graduate, Wang Cheng-chung, has an internship in a rural primary school. He is prepared to leave after that, but meets with the Taiwan 921 earthquake.(n)

programme.title: The Return Of The Cuckoo
programme.desc: After Kwan Ho marries and migrates to America, Man Cho continues with his life in Macau. He is a busy tour guide and has developed a close bond with his mute friend Kiki.(n)

programme.title: The Tag-Along Devil Fish
programme.desc: Master Tiger, a Taoist god, seals a demon in the body of a fish. However, a small fish jumps out of the body and a boy brings it home. After that, a series of weird incidents happens.(n)

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Kill Mobile tells the story of seven long-time friends who play a party game in which everyone hands over their phones to reveal all their calls, texts and WeChat messages, opening a Pandora's box in the room.(n)

programme.title: Napping Princess
programme.desc: In the near future, a high-school senior discovers that events in her waking life begin to parallel events in her dreams.(n)

programme.title: Tag Along 2
programme.desc: Social worker Li Shu-fen is often overwhelmed by her heavy workload and neglects her daughter Li Ya-ting as a result. When she discovers that Ya-ting has gone missing, she realises there is a past demon hidden at the bottom of her heart.(n)

programme.title: Poker King
programme.desc: Although Jack's family is involved in the casino business, he has never shared an interest in gaming until he played Texas Hold 'em on the Internet. Rival Uno is the manager at Randy's casino.(n)

programme.title: One Cut Of The Dead
programme.desc: Things go badly for a hack director and film crew shooting a low-budget zombie movie in an abandoned World War II Japanese facility, when they are attacked by real zombies.(n)

programme.title: When Ghost Meets Zombie
programme.desc: An expressionless zombie allows a free-spirited female ghost to possess him so she can use his body to enter a male beauty pageant.(n)

programme.title: Brother Of The Year
programme.desc: Jane lives with her brother Chut, with her being the only one doing everything around the house. But Chut will need to learn to take care of himself when Jane is about to get married and move to Japan.(n)

programme.title: Chasing The Dragon
programme.desc: An illegal immigrant from Mainland China sneaks into corrupt British-colonized Hong Kong in 1963, transforming himself into a ruthless and emerging drug lord.(n)

programme.title: Line Walker 2
programme.desc: After they uncover evidence that there is corruption in the police force, three police officers in Hong Kong try to discover which of them can be trusted.(n)

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: While two criminals hide out at a woman's apartment after a botched robbery, an ex-cop tries to find a missing gun.(n)

programme.title: The Promise ()
programme.desc: Ib and Boum decide to commit suicide together in Bangkok in 1997. After reneging on her promise, the vengeful ghost of Ib returns 20 years later to haunt Boum and her 15-year-old daughter, Bell.(n)

programme.title: The Unity Of Heroes

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment

programme.desc: Felicity stands by her recent decisions regarding her family. Meanwhile, Diggle and Lyla (AUDREY MARIE ANDERSON) continue to look into the Dante painting that Curtis found.(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: The Elseworlds Crossover continues as Oliver, Barry and Supergirl head to Gotham City to figure out why their reality changed. They get information from Kate Kane/Batwoman.(n)

programme.title: Top 20 Funniest
programme.desc: Laughter is the best medicine...and it makes for a great television show, too! Get ready for non-stop hours of wall-to-wall laughs with TOP 20 FUNNIEST.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone seems to know who the father of Rachel's unborn baby is.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel's attempt to explain to everyone how they ended up in bed together.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe meets the friendly fianc? of her flighty twin, Ursula.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross is happy to learn that pregnant Rachel wants to find her own apartment.(n)

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect
programme.desc: Michael wows mall shoppers with snakes that soothe and spiders that stitch, and at an art supply store, a woman finds out that she's a natural-born wood whittler. Plus, an abandoned house won't let go of its precious things.(n)

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect
programme.desc: At a yard sale, Michael helps a man realize his amazing mind powers and shocks a college student by discovering she's the heir to the entire lot. Later, an art gallery's tribal mask goes missing and has the security guard fearing war!(n)

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect
programme.desc: While doing scientific research, Michael makes things heavy with some otherworldly air. Then, at a bakery, the new rolls are so light, they defy gravity. And as a golf instructor, Michael gets caught by the ultimate sand trap!(n)

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect
programme.desc: At a local copy shop, Michael introduces a print-by-hand technique, and at a bait and tackle shop, he unveils the latest fish fashion trends. Finally, at an office, Michael pulls a switcheroo, and the new temp has no idea who's the boss.(n)

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys take over New Orleans, as they steal sips from strangers' drinks at a famous bar, spin the Wheel of Voo-Doom on Bourbon Street, and crash some horse and buggy rides. Then, tonight's loser turns into a legendary swamp monster.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone seems to know who the father of Rachel's unborn baby is.(n)

programme.title: Mile 22
programme.desc: An elite intelligence officer, aided by a top-secret tactical command unit, tries to smuggle a mysterious police officer with sensitive information out of the country.(n)

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: The world's most revered monster is reborn as visionary new director Gareth Edwards (Monsters) unleashes the epic action adventure GODZILLA. Starring an international ensemble cast led by Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Oscar nominee Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai, Inception), Elizabeth Olsen, Oscar winner Juliette Binoche (The English Patient) and Oscar nominee Sally Hawkins (Blue Jasmine) with Oscar nominee David Strathairn (Good Night, and Good Luck.(n)

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: When an experiment gone awry mutates animals into a raging creature of enormous size. Okoye team up with geneticist Kate to secure an antidote, fighting his way through an ever-changing battlefield.(n)

programme.title: The Losers
programme.desc: Members of an elite U.S. Special Forces unit were sent into the Bolivian jungle on a search and destroy mission. Being set up, betrayed and left for dead, the group makes plans to even the score.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys are concerned as Sheldon searches for an alternative to human companionship after he and Amy (MAYIM BIALIK) break up. LAURIE METCALF reprises her role as Sheldon's mother.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: An embarrassing secret of Wolowitz's comes to light, while Sheldon and Raj have a small war at work. KATEE SACKHOFF and GEORGE TAKEI guest star as Wolowitz's love gurus.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard realizes he's the only one without a girlfriend, while Sheldon wants to get rid of his.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A visit from Raj's sister (guest star AARTI MANKAD) creates tension among the guys -- especially when Leonard keeps an affair secret from Sheldon, Howard and Raj.(n)

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: The wealthy parents of a Neptune High senior hire Mars Investigations to look into a cultish group their son, Casey (JONATHAN BENNETT), has joined. Veronica cozies up to Casey and infiltrates "The Farm" to learn more about its operation and its charismatic leader. Meanwhile, Veronica attempts to dispel a condemned killer's contention that her real father is Jake Kane.(n)

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: When Weevil's poker winnings are missing after a game at Logan's house, Veronica questions each player to piece together the evening's events and catch the thief. Meanwhile, on the eve of the Echolls' annual Christmas party extravaganza, Keith is hired by Lynn Echolls (recurring guest star LISA RINNA) to track down one of the potential stalkers of her husband, Aaron (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN).(n)

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: A serial killer who targets college girls has struck again, and the town of Neptune is terrified. Keith, who previously worked on the case, temporarily returns to the sheriff's department to help catch the killer. Meanwhile, Veronica's own investigative caseload (and income) increases as she conducts background checks to get the "dirt" on her schoolmates' parents.(n)

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: When parents accuse Veronica of providing a fake ID to their son, who's now in an alcohol-induced coma, and files suit, the search to find who's responsible leads Veronica to a clandestine, exclusive organization operating on Neptune High's campus with a possible connection to Duncan. Meanwhile, Aaron Echolls (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN) hires Keith to find out who's supplying pictures to the tabloids that humiliate his wife, Lynn (recurring guest star LISA RINNA).(n)

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: After being hired by hip-hop heavyweight Percy "Bone" Hamilton (ANTHONY ANDERSON - "Kangaroo Jack," "Barbershop") to find his kidnapped daughter, Veronica and Keith look to the music mogul's long list of enemies and family members and the girl's Neptune High social circle for clues to her whereabouts.(n)

programme.title: Gotham
programme.desc: A very much alive Jeremiah returns and organizes a twisted recreation of the murder of Bruce's parents with the help of Jervis Tetch aka Mad Hatter (BENEDICT SAMUEL).(n)

programme.title: Gotham
programme.desc: While Bruce and Alfred explore the tunnels beneath the city, Bullock's past comes back to haunt him when he and Gordon investigate two murders at Sirens.(n)

programme.title: Gotham
programme.desc: After Gordon is shot, he hallucinates a trial for his life that could have deadly real consequences. Meanwhile, Ivy returns and puts her spell on Bruce.(n)

programme.title: Gotham
programme.desc: While a pregnant Barbara turns to Lee for help, Gordon and Bruce find themselves face-to-face with a newly transformed Eduardo… and the real mastermind behind the city's chaos.(n)

programme.title: Gotham
programme.desc: As Bane enacts his final plan for Gotham's destruction, Gordon rallies his former enemies to save the city. And Bruce's decision to leave Gotham devastates Selina.(n)
